channel.title: Need Help with a few things? [Ricscape v5]
channel.description: Ok, well ive been looking around for quite some time. and well im trying to add skill capes for my server i added them but i use a special client, so on silbsoft web client you see clues? any help with that? also im woundering if any one can get me a script for ::ipban? yes i am new to coding/ what ever you want to call it. also just adding some items ie: d bow, d boots, dragon fire. if you can help that would be great! thanks

item.title: Need Help with a few things? [Ricscape v5]
item.dc:creator: @Random666 Random666
item.description:
@Random666 wrote:

For some of those items all you have to do is recolour, e.g colour rune boots red so u get drag boots.
I’m pretty sure they have recolouring tuts in turorial section

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with a few things? [Ricscape v5]

item.title: Need Help with a few things? [Ricscape v5]
item.dc:creator: @skullman25 skullman25
item.description:
@skullman25 wrote:

[quote=“Roderick50, post:2, topic:184725”]Here is some Id’s

d full helm 15195
Bandos plate 15348
Bandos bottom 15349
dragfire 15185
ammy of glory (t) 14519
Armadyl hat 15345
3rd age mage hat 14509
bandos boots 15350
3rd age kite 14514
dark bow 15156

I hope they help, and if i find an ipban command ill let you know :)[/quote]
I dont think he is using Silabsoft. He said he has a special client.

Read full topic
